soot

Class PhaseOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.PhaseOptions

  • public class PhaseOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the phase options of the various soot phases.

      • getBoolean

        public static boolean getBoolean(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options,
                 java.lang.String name)
        This method returns true iff key "name" is in options and maps to "true".

      • getBoolean

        public static boolean getBoolean(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 boolean defaultValue)
        If key "name" is in options, this method returns true iff it maps to "true". If the key "name" is not in options, the given default value is returned.

      • getString

        public static java.lang.String getString(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options,
                         java.lang.String name)
        This method returns the value of "name" in options or "" if "name" is not found.

      • getFloat

        public static float getFloat(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options,
             java.lang.String name)
        This method returns the float value of "name" in options or 1.0 if "name" is not found.

      • getInt

        public static int getInt(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options,
         java.lang.String name)
        This method returns the integer value of "name" in options or 0 if "name" is not found.
